name: broken-link-checker
description: Test a web site for broken links.
helpMarkDown: Recursively test the pages of a web site for broken links. Provide a base URL and see the results in the build log.
author: Christian BÃ¤r

inputs.name: baseurl
inputs.label: Base URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL of the entry page. Linked pages with the same base URL will be checked recursively.

inputs.name: exclude
inputs.label: Excluded links
inputs.helpMarkDown: Links that should't be reported as broken (one URL per line).

inputs.name: headOrGet
inputs.label: Request HTTP method
inputs.helpMarkDown: The HTTP request method used in checking links. If you experience problems, try using "GET", however if you set it to HEAD and the check result is an HTTP 405, there will be an automatic retry with GET anyways.
